meanings.definition: To undergo a cosmetic procedure to improve the appearance of one's face.
meanings.sent1: She facelifted her features to look younger.
meanings.sent2: After she facelifted, her confidence soared.
meanings.sent3: He joked that he would facelift his way to a new identity.
meanings.sent4: Her smile facelifted her whole demeanor.
meanings.sent5: The city skyline was facelifted by the sunrise.

meanings.definition: Having undergone a cosmetic procedure to improve the appearance of one's face.
meanings.sent1: The facelifted actress looked stunning on the red carpet.
meanings.sent2: She felt more confident with her facelifted appearance.
meanings.sent3: The old house got a facelifted look with new paint.
meanings.sent4: The garden had a facelifted charm after the renovations.
meanings.sent5: The car's facelifted design turned heads on the road.
